link.title: ACS Early Learning Center - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: School and all other activities are cancelled for ACSD for the remainder of the 19-20 school year. The district will remain on online instruction until May 28th. Please contact school office staff by phone or email. Check the COVID-19 ACSD Closure Updates landing page featured on our district web site for all updates.

img.alt: AHS Varsity Boys Basketball vs. Rivery Valley 19-20

div.div: AHS Varsity Boys Basketball vs. Rivery Valley 19-20

div.p: The Athens City School District seeks to be a premier PreK-12 academic institution helping each student become an inquisitive, civically-engaged adult equipped to build a better future in a rapidly changing world.

The Athens City School District collaborates with students, parents and the community to provide an enriched and rigorous learning environment where every student uses multiple pathways to grow, problem-solve, and reach their potential as a lifelong learner and productive citizen.

Demolition has begun on the East Elementary School Building. In an effort to keep the community informed about our progress on the project, a camera has been installed that will take still photos every few minutes. A link has been added to our website allowing access to see the current site view. Updated "time-lapse" videos will be periodically created and available by clicking the "time-lapse" play button on the viewer screen. The camera will remain in place throughout the course of the project. A camera will be installed at the Morrison-Gordon site in the Spring of 2020 when that project gets underway.

a.strong: Click Here to See the East Elementary Building Process

div.a: AHS Produces 3-D Printed Masks for The Athens Police Department

div.span: Two weeks ago Superintendent Tom Gibbs was reading articles related to concerns about PPE and came across one that caught his attention. The Veterans Health Administration had created a face mask that was recently FDA approved for use in medical settings. The unique thing about the face mask was that it was produced with a 3-D printer. The design has a predominately plastic mask with an insert in the front where a small piece of a surgical mask can be placed. The plastic mask itself can be ...

Ohio Imagination Library Now Available to All Athens County Children Under Age 5!

div.span:
We have an exciting new opportunity for children under age 5 in Athens County! If you have any children who qualify, please take a few minutes to enroll. If you know anyone else who has children who could benefit from this program, please forward this information on to them as well! Access to books is one of the leading indicators of early reading success. If every child in Athens County had 12 books delivered to their home each year from birth to age 5, it would be absolutely amazing!
...

ACSD Kindergarten Registration for 2020-2021: Information & Dates

div.span:
Please Note:
Your child MUST BE 5 YEARS OLD ON OR BEFORE August 1, 2020 to be eligible for registration. Please bring your child with you Plan on being at the school for 45 minutes — 1.5 hours. You must arrive at least 45 minutes before the end of the session
Location:
NEW FOR THIS YEAR: ALL Registration events will be held at the Athens City School District Central Office
21 Birge Drive, Chauncey, Ohio 45719 Please enter through the front main ...

Camp Invention® is for children entering grades K-6th.
Location: East-West Elementary School, 41 Central Avenue, Athens, OH 45701
Date: June 8 - 12, 2020
Time & Cost: 9:00am - 3:30pm | $235 (before discount)
Camp Director: April Louthain | alouthain@athenscsd.org
Register at INVENT.ORG/CAMP or 800-968-4332
